hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:I twisted with my own hands the garlands for the Budn of the Prophet (ﷺ) who garlanded and marked them, and then made them proceed to Mecca; Yet no permissible thing was regarded as illegal for him then

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَشْعَرَ وَقَلَّدَ بِذِي الْحُلَيْفَةِ ثُمَّ أَحْرَمَ
chapter.eng-name: Marking and garlanding (the Hadi) at Dhul-Hulaifa and then assuming Ihram
